Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 5 Upādinnattika » 5.1 Paṭiccavāra » 5.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 5.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Naindriya
Upādinnattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Naindriya
20.
2500Upādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati naindriyapaccayā—  asaññasattānaṃ mahābhūte paṭicca rūpajīvitindriyaṃ. (1)
2501Anupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati naindriyapaccayā—  bāhiraṃ…  āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca…pe… . (1)
<< Naāhāraup Najhāna >>
